Text: LunchPST How about getting together for lunch next week or the week after Im trying to arrange for Mr Randy Kruger to be our guest speaker The topic When doesnt equal Accounting the Andersen Way Let me know what works for you guys Schroeder

RE Lunch Thurs Youre in OK on Friday so you cant make lunch Thursday DarronCGiron enroncom To cc Subject RE Lunch Thurs PM Great just as I say my schedule is open it closes I will be in the great state of Oklahoma on Friday so I will have to cancel If I was going it would be Zydeco all the way DG Original Message From ENRON Sent Tuesday October PM To Subject Lunch Thurs Well it looks like the th is good for everybody although I may be a little late or have to leave early depending on when we meet Noon works best for me if that is alright with everyone I would suggest somewhere around the Bank One or Shell buildings as the most central to all Restaurants around there include Zydeco Becks Prime a Chinese place in Shell or Luthers Let me know your preference Schroeder This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE Lunch Thurs By the way how much of the BN is your fault DarronCGiron enroncom To cc Subject RE Lunch Thurs PM I leave Thurs morning and return Friday night I dont know why I typed Friday DG Original Message From ENRON Sent Tuesday October PM To Giron Darron C Subject RE Lunch Thurs Youre in OK on Friday so you cant make lunch Thursday DarronCGiron enroncom To cc Subject RE Lunch Thurs PM Great just as I say my schedule is open it closes I will be in the great state of Oklahoma on Friday so I will have to cancel If I was going it would be Zydeco all the way DG Original Message From ENRON Sent Tuesday October PM To Subject Lunch Thurs Well it looks like the th is good for everybody although I may be a little late or have to leave early depending on when we meet Noon works best for me if that is alright with everyone I would suggest somewhere around the Bank One or Shell buildings as the most central to all Restaurants around there include Zydeco Becks Prime a Chinese place in Shell or Luthers Let me know your preference Schroeder This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Lunch Thurs Well it looks like the th is good for everybody although I may be a little late or have to leave early depending on when we meet Noon works best for me if that is alright with everyone I would suggest somewhere around the Bank One or Shell buildings as the most central to all Restaurants around there include Zydeco Becks Prime a Chinese place in Shell or Luthers Let me know your preference Schroeder

LunchJust wanted to see if you guys were interested in getting together for lunch or after work in the next couple of weeks If so send me what days you already have something planned and Ill try to find one where we are all free Also indicate lunch or drinks Schroeder

LunchSince Todd was the only one of you guys to use the reply to all and thus try to make my job easier we will go with his choice of where to eat which is Becks Prime Todd makes a good point that it tends to get crowded around noon so lets meet at so that we may get a table If Im not there go ahead without me Ive got a meeting that may last til noon Ill catch up with you after that Also Giron will be in lovely Oklahoma no doubt some punishment for his role in the BN in writeoffs they took and wont be joining us See you tomorrow Schroeder
Lunch PST Let me know if you can still make lunch this Thursday If you have suggestions for time place let me know that as well Schroeder
Phone PST I heard youre on the th floor now Whats the new I was just going to chat about UBS what this means for you Do you guys start trading next week Im at Schroeder
LunchPST It doesnt look like there is a good day for everybody next week How about Thursday Jan Schroeder

LunchPST OK you slackers excluding Shaw Ill give you another chance to respond Lunch this week or next let me know whats good If meeting after work is better for you let me know Certainly all of you can stop shredding documents for minutes to respond Schroeder

LunchHow does Thursday the th sound to everybody I think it works for everybody except Todd who I didnt hear from which may mean hes out of town Im flexible on time place but Girons on the south side Todds by the Park shops I think and the rest are up north so a central location would probably be best Let me know what you think and Ill coordinate or just reply to all and well work it out amongst ourselves Schroeder PS Bear had a baby girl last Friday named Reagan Mother and daughter are doing fine

Houston Beta Kappa Distinguished Speaker SeriesGentlemen The Houston Beta Kappa Distinguished Speaker Series will continue tomorrow October at PM at Zydecos in the Bank One Building Our guest speaker will be Darron Giron His topic will be How to really fuck up a good company in a hurry aka The Enron Story Please let me know if you can attend Schroeder
LunchPST It seems everyone agreed to Ninfas Lets meet at let me know if a different time is better Ninfas is located in the tunnel under the JP Morgan Chase Tower at Travis See you there Schroeder
